metadata.description: From his first meeting with Jake Sully to his acceptance of the Last Shadow, Tsu'tey's life takes a path he could not anticipate, and which the film told only a part. Return to Pandora as the story of Avatar is told from the perspective of Tsu'tey, warrior of the Omatikaya tribe. Collects issues #1–#6 of the series, plus the short story ''Brothers'' from Free Comic Book Day 2017.
metadata.name: Avatar: Tsu'tey's Path
